timeline.bodyText: This was necessary to perform list indexing in rule_match_nosem. The typing docs also suggest using List for return types and Iterable for arguments: https://docs.python.org/3/library/typing.html#typing.List
timeline.author: mschwager
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -76,7 +76,7 @@ def end(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
         return self._end
 
     @property
-    def lines(self) -> Iterable[str]:
+    def lines(self) -> List[str]:
